H0.text: An epithalamium is a poem written to mark what occasion. Birthday

H1.text: An epithalamium is a poem written to mark what occasion. Graduation

H2.text: An epithalamium is a poem written to mark what occasion. Anniversary

H3.text: An epithalamium is a poem written to mark what occasion. WEDDING/MARRIAGE

A4.text: An epithalamium is a poem written specifically to celebrate the bride on the way to her marital chamber.

A5.text: It was originally among the Greeks a song in praise of bride and bridegroom, sung by a number of boys and girls at the door of the nuptial chamber.
